item.title: linux服务器搭建ssm项目环境
item.description: 购买服务器 阿里云云翼计划：9.5块钱/月 配置环境 jdk环境 1 2 yum -y install java-1.8.0-openjdk.x86_64 java -version mysql环境 安装mysql 1 2 3 4 cd /tmp wget http://repo.mysql.com/mysql-community-release-el7-5.noarch.rpm rpm -ivh mysql-community-release-el7-5.noarch.rpm yum install mysql mysql-server mysql-devel -y 启动
